channel.title: Teen Glamour Minute
channel.itunes:author: New Media Conversations
channel.description: Teen Glamour Minute is a podcast covering teen beauty including skincare, diet, fashion, and eating. Each week we will talk about how you can look your best so that you can be happy and healthy.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Teen Glamour Podcast
channel.itunes:summary: Teen Glamour Minute is a podcast covering teen beauty including skincare, diet, fashion, and eating. Each week we will talk about how you can look your best so that you can be happy and healthy.

item.title: Beauty is Skin Deep
item.itunes:author: New Media Conversations
item.itunes:summary: Learn how you can look your best by eating healthy, avoiding nicotine and alcohol and drinking plenty of water.
item.itunes:keywords: Teen Beauty tips fashion body health women woman love cute
